channel.title: Tenants and Multi-tenant Apps :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Tenants and Multi-tenant applications Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Description: Defines what a tenant is , what multi-tenancy is, why it can be good to divide users up into tenants internally, how an app is considered to be multi-tenant, and at a very high-level how an app knows which tenant to use when a user wants to sign in.
